sentence.text: Furious with Gilbert 's panic , Rohmer pushed past him and yanked the door wide .
I yanked the door open and hit the threshold running .
She yanked the sleeping-bag even higher .
Iris yanked her leotard from a drawer and headed for the bathroom .
Negligently he reached into a front garden and yanked a flower from its tree .
He yanked the cable from the socket under the console , threw it out of the TARDIS and closed the door .
He rode at it , braked , yanked Mariana off the pillion and yelled at her to climb .
Grabbing her by the arm , he yanked her to her feet .
FitzAlan reached down and yanked her to her feet .
She yanked Anna toward the car and did n't stop even when the child stumbled and almost fell .

He put his hand in his jacket pocket , searching for his wallet , and as he did , Doug , serious now , yanked Harry towards him and whispered in tones from which all traces of his cockney accent were now absent .
She walked across the room and , grabbing her daughter 's long hair , yanked her towards the cell door .
Avoid long trailing flexes wherever possible ; they are a trip hazard , and a careless foot could yank the flex out of a plug or appliance , or pull the appliance over .
It would have been easy for anyone to reach in and yank a club out of the bag . "
She gasped as he yanked her closer .
Getting tiredly to her feet , she yanked open the door and then just stood there , staring helplessly .
One of them grabbed at the first man 's hair and yanked his head back , beating at his face with his other hand .
He yanks me up by the hair .
Terry grabbed at Joe 's hands and tried to yank them away , but the grip was too strong .
He ran to the bedroom and yanked open the window just as Saunders and the guard entered the flat .
He felt himself yanked across the room and flung across his father 's legs , his body protected while his outstretched hand dangled like bait in the dog 's face .
Creed yanked back the lift door and then the outer one .
Barrow yanked back the bedclothes and both men gasped .
He virtually threw me on the delivery bed and the midwife yanked down my trousers -- and there was the baby , with his head and a hand out , gazing at us .
Henry pulled open the door , yanked off the three top sheets and scuttled back to his car .

Henry yanked out the jack , groped for the papers and stuffed them into his pocket .
The man screamed , yanked out the pin and threw the grenade .
I yanked out my wallet and went through the credit slips and travellers " -cheque dockets .
